titles: The golden boke of Marcus Aurelius Emperour and eloquent oratour
author: Guevara, Antonio de, Bp., d. 1545?
Berners, John Bourchier, Lord, 1466 or 7-1533.
publisher: In aedibus Thomae Bertheleti regii impressoris],
notes: A translation of the unauthorised version of: Guevara, Antonio de.  Relox de principes.

Place of publication and printer's name from colophon, which reads: Thus endeth the volume of Marke Aurelie .. translated out of Frenche into englyshe by Iohn̄ Bourchier knyghte lorde Barners .. Anno. M.D.XXXVII. ..
The final leaf contains a printer's mark.
Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.
keywords: Education of princes --  Early works to 1800.
